version_description:
- real-time visualization of pulse waveform
- bug fixes

- real-time visualization of pulse waveform
- bug fixes

- Updated for iOS 7.1
- Easier access to past recordings (History)
- Simpler sharing of results
- Bug fixes (finger detection etc.)

- Updated for iOS 7.1
- Easier access to past recordings (History)
- Simpler sharing of results
- Bug fixes (finger detection etc.)

- Fixed reminders
- Fixed a crash when the system memory is running low.
- Fixed a bug that causes occasional data loss.
- Improved responsiveness of data view.

- Fixed reminders
- Fixed a crash when the system memory is running low.

- Improved responsiveness of data view.

- Fixed reminders
- Fixed a crash when the system memory is running low.
- Fixed a bug that causes occasional data loss.
- Improved responsiveness of data view.

Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed leaderboard - compete with your friends!
2. Fixed weight entry error
3. Fixed occasional freeze during measurement

Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed leaderboard - compete with your friends!
2. Fixed weight entry error
3. Fixed occasional freeze during measurement

- Integration with Apple Health! (Go to Cardiio > Settings for setup)
- iOS 8 compatible
- Improved performance

- Integration with Apple Health! (Go to Cardiio > Settings for setup)
- iOS 8 compatible
- Improved performance

1. Today Widget (iOS 8+)
Use Cardiio’s today widget to see your most recent measurements, measure your heart rate, or start a workout! To enable it, open the Notification Center by swiping down from the top of the screen, tap ‘Edit’ at the very bottom, and enable ‘Cardiio’.

2. Earn Real Rewards
Win prizes and earn tangible rewards when you consistently track your heart rate or complete workouts (Note: Apple is not a sponsor of any promotion).

3. Pump it Up!
Now you can perform our 7 minute workout to your favorite music. Simply start playing your jam, then launch the workout!

4. Bug fixes
-Fixed crash in iOS 6 devices.
-Fixed loss of audio in 7 min workout.

1. Today Widget (iOS 8+)
Use Cardiio’s today widget to see your most recent measurements, measure your heart rate, or start a workout! To enable it, open the Notification Center by swiping down from the top of the screen, tap ‘Edit’ at the very bottom, and enable ‘Cardiio’.

2. Earn Real Rewards
Win prizes and earn tangible rewards when you consistently track your heart rate or complete workouts (Note: Apple is not a sponsor of any promotion).

3. Pump it Up!
Now you can perform our 7 minute workout to your favorite music. Simply start playing your jam, then launch the workout!

4. Bug fixes
-Fixed crash in iOS 6 devices.
-Fixed loss of audio in 7 min workout.

-Fully translated into 12 different languages (English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, German, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Swedish, Portugese, Spanish).

-Improved heart rate measurement algorithm

-Improved progress bar indicator

-Bug fixes

1. Improved experience for iPhone 7 Plus (now uses telephoto camera that is closer to the flash)
2. Bug fixes
